website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Strix Scar II has great performance and a high refresh rate screen with a thin bezel. But it still looks like it was designed in a dorm room.
pros: Excellent performance from a strong CPU-GPU combo
The better-than-most 144Hz screen has a slim bezel, giving it a modern feel
cons: The boxy camo-covered body doesn't look particularly interesting
The backlit keyboard lacks individual key lighting
Battery life isn't great, even for a gaming laptop

customer_reviews.title: Item defective when received.
customer_reviews.text: The thing was a beast and it was built beautifully. A lot of titles hit the 144fps mark. The problem is whenever you tilted it forward, it would click. I thought it was a HDD failure, but it wasn't. The right fan was failing. For $2,000 dollars that is unacceptable considering the GTX 1070 and i7 8750H NEED proper cooling. I returned this item for a full refund. I'd buy another one but, as a college student, I can't risk having this thing failing me when I'm away from home. My case might be a rare one, but I can't take that risk.
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and she and my son (they have three computer science degrees between them) did a lot of research on gaming laptops. It seems that all gaming laptops have their issues but this is the one that they settled on and she has not had any complaints after a month of use. I'm not a gamer so I don't really know the issues involved. I'm in the macOS ecosystem so Windows laptops are not in my interest area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a very disappointing headache!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the money to spend on a bit higher end laptop, go for it. I upgraded from ACER HELIOS 300 to This mess and to be honest, I've never struggled so far than with this. This was shipped International, or else I would've asked to refund this. 1.Bloatware (way too much) 2. Some keys don't work 3. The backlit is not working, nor it's software. 4. ASUS doesn't do a good job on updating the drivers. Overall, if you intend to purchase this, do not. I'm trying to save your hard earned money. I'm deeply regret purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyzan Naizer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop, performs amazing, i love that the keyboard dosent get hot during gaming witch makes it a very comfortable keyboard
customer_reviews.author: stanlerd

customer_reviews.title: I found this in my new laptop
customer_reviews.text: I definitely order new laptop but some how I found used SD card that is already inserted in my laptop. Very very interesting. I need some explanation about this. Maybe.. someone used this laptop and maybe this laptop is not a new laptop maybe refurnished??
customer_reviews.author: WON TAE YOO

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Title
customer_reviews.text: This laptop does NOT come with the +1TB storage out of the box. It is only expandable to that much. I bought this laptop thinking was going to get a total of 1.25 TB of storage but that is not the case. Otherwise it is a decent gaming laptop, but the misleading title has proven to be incredibly frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: darn good
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research before buying and this is the gold standard in this price range. The battery life, perhaps understandably is really short given how much this game is pulsing through the processor.
customer_reviews.author: Al Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming laptop !
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Acer laptop prior to this and looking at other models all laptop gaming were really bad! After a while researching decided to give this one a shot as I loved Asus laptops it's performance was amazing! Heating is not an issue but it needs a cooling pad, battery life sucks but that's ok, no thermal throttling or stuff like this, it is loud but I didn't care about that so much as I am using headphones anyways I can say it's a really good one, the price sounds expensive but it was worth for me I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tareq haj taha najjar

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. It is a beast that could handle any game graphic setting and texture rendering from the top AAA game that provide a consistency of 60 fps. It will get loud while under heavy work but a headphone would help. Except for the odd location of the camera, this laptop is very well built with a beautiful looking, sturdy design for its thin bezel and considered light weight it provided in compared to other similar light tier laptops on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Quan Phan

customer_reviews.title: Extra quality,Fast shipment **** stars for the seller
customer_reviews.text: First of all i want to thank for the fast shipment and this is the only seller who can ship this product to APO.From US to Afghanistan took 12 days.The laptop build quality is outstanding,the speakers are loud and the fans are quite.The only thing that annoying me on the keyboard is the Start button and Caps look button have a red light leaking...but its nothing compare to the performance that you get at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Gembalov

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, defective item, subpar customer service
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is good, except that you're rolling the dice when ordering it. With a decent chance of receiving one with some type of defect. Mine had an internal hardware issue and after going through 3 people all they could offer was that I send it to ASUS to repair it. I shouldn't have to send off something I spent over a thousand dollars to get "fixed". They wouldn't do an exchange for me either so now I have to return it and then after the refund is received I have to order it again. Major inconvenience. Let's hope that the next one I receive actually works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop only one flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine with this bad boy, the battery life is a bit short but it is expected since its a gaming laptop. Works like a charm. The aura effect on the keyboard is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be warned of defective laptops
customer_reviews.text: I had this laptop for less than a year when it started just doing random fps drops to 1-2fps every 5 seconds or so and when I contacted support they said it just needed for the bios to be updated, after that the problem became not as bad but still you couldn't play anything without fps drops to 5-10fps every 7 seconds or so, after that I contacted support and now they said I need to reset the bios and that just brought back the previous worse fps drops and the laptop only had a 12month warranty so at this point it was past the warranty. So be warned of the designed failure with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Storojenko

customer_reviews.title: So far solid
customer_reviews.text: I am not a computer gaming person, I bought this model because I want a fast processor for photo editing. have it for a month or so and it is responsive and smooth. I am happy with it so far. This is my first Asus laptop, will see whether it is as durable as my previous laptop which I have it 9 or 10 years and it is still working fine but the battery is dead. Anyway will see!
customer_reviews.author: A. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, fantastic performance, great features for the price, the keyboard is very good and feels lighter since the weight is very well distributed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than 24 hours after opening, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Entered BIOS loop less than 24 hours after opening, has to be sent in for repair. Crazy disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carl E Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Find Another One
customer_reviews.text: This laptop's battery life lasts under two hours when it is not plugged in. This is even with the RGB lights off, low brightness, and power saving settings on. After two year of using this laptop my touch pad has lost the surface on it, even though the laptop is used just for coding. Overall, find another laptop, unless you like being plugged into the outlet all the time, a broken touch pad, and a VERY loud computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsain

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Good performance. Is not as heavy as other gaming laptops with similar specs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but some issues
customer_reviews.text: product is great, powerful and beautiful , it deserves 5 star but the one I got has some issues on mic and speaker, there is no sound from headphones and microphones randomly , but it should not be an common issue,whatever it’s still a beast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A relatively good product, a little noisy, a low battery, but does the rest of the work
customer_reviews.text: I know that nothing is perfect. It's fun to play with, the computer is very powerful, but our battery runs out relatively quickly and is sometimes a noisy laptop. Not sorry I bought - very like ASUS
customer_reviews.author: Shachar

customer_reviews.title: power and beauty
customer_reviews.text: Since I don't use the webcam it doesn't matter where it is placed. It's a very usefull pc for gaming. Nice touch and powerfull enough to give you very nice graphics on a heavy game as Final Fantasy 14.
customer_reviews.author: DELERAY Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks ASUS
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gaming laptop ever I have it
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for about 3 months now. The fan works great, if a little loud, and it processes my games way better than my old ASUS. Handles editing software and digital art programs very well thanks to that second drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, not worth the hastle trying to get it.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is fine, performs great, play most games at ultra settings, the 1060 is great. My issue was I had to try and order it and fight with amazon 3 times just to get them to ship it. Once it was shipped I had 2 day shipping, Then had to fight with UPS to try and get my package.
customer_reviews.author: Glennan

customer_reviews.title: Highest C/P in ROG series
customer_reviews.text: High performance, Gaming design for whole item, not full metal material but really great if you feel it, reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for the price, minimal bloatware, nice keyboard and spacing, runs games like a dream. Fan is very quiet, even on overdrive mode most people couldn't hear the fan over the running ac unit. Not super heavy either. Very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I have is one of my GPU fans that makes clicking noise sometimes. This could be due to the salt in the air as I live at the beach. So it possibly could have oxidized a little and that is why? Either way I really enjoy this Laptop and would buy another from the ROG line when I need to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Pyr0man

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, battery life is low but just leave it plugged in, great for gaming
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Is the G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, wonderful design, high quality product, but a really poor batery life even ir you only use it to navigate
customer_reviews.author: Alberth Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery for brand new laptop
customer_reviews.text: Laptop battery was dead when first got the laptop. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I use this laptop every day, even though this laptop is great for gaming, there is a big problem, there is not enough memory to install many games. But even though, the memory is terrible, it's an overall good laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the capabilities that this gaming laptop has. It is visually stunning and works really well. The display is beautiful. It didn't come with a mouse bit that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ahumada

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This item is very terrible. The CPU fan always runs at high speed along with big noise. I already repaired it one time through Amazon, the problem was back again after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Z

customer_reviews.title: Smooth gaming and high quality graphics
customer_reviews.text: Not complaining, really good gaming labtop especially for being the first one, it runs everything smoothly. I very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great but my unit has issue please reply asap
customer_reviews.text: Trying to do a contact for you guys because my unit has a problem and ita kinda annoying that my laptop screen is flicker did help me about this
customer_reviews.author: joms

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, the only problem is to redeem the code of CALL OF DUTY: BLACK OPS 4, it is not clear when requesting the code.
customer_reviews.author: juan alfredo blanco chavarria

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gaming laptops on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming device with plenty of power for a portable device. Easy to use software, minimal amount of bloatware installed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Fan noise is a little bit too loud
customer_reviews.text: this laptop look so awesome, but the fan noise is a little too loud. but i dont mind it
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: dead pixel in the screen is not great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but there is an issue with a dead pixel in the screen
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and speedy!
customer_reviews.text: I received the laptop a week early! Love the look and the speed - exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Poor service
customer_reviews.text: I received a ASUS Chromebook instead of this laptop. 😑😑😑
customer_reviews.author: Aparna Ganesan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: there is no any comment about this laptop , all games running smoothly .
customer_reviews.author: baselomega

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop easy 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Best machine for gaming. Fans are a little noisy, nothing a good gaming headset won’t fix. Plays any game at full chat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superfast and powerful machine
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Laptop, superfast and stylish. Touchpad is super awesome and changing lights on keyboard is super cool.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre laptop at high price point
customer_reviews.text: Good- 1. Build quality 2. Screen 3. Touch pad Bad- 1. Wrongly mentioned windows pro, the laptop was shipped with windows home 2. Fans run loud on minimal load 3. Below average battery life 4. Sound drivers have issue, need to restart to resolve 5. Lots of bloatware 6. Very poor WiFi signal. The dual WiFi is just an Advert not functional at all. Overall- not happy with this product. Lots of other better options at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Taher

product_meta.title: ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Slim Gaming Laptop GL504, 15.6” 144Hz IPS Type, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16GB DDR4, 256GB PCIe SSD + 1TB SSHD, Windows 10 Home - GL504GS-DS74
product_meta.description: Style:GTX 1070The new ROG Strix Scar II gaming Laptop brings you even more power and style for FPS and battle Royale gaming Boasting a 144Hz refresh rate display with ultra-narrow bezel PCIe NVMe SSD GeForce GTX graphics and 8th Gen Intel Core i7 processor the new Strix GL504 has all the power needed to conquer the latest titles without breaking a sweat
feature_bullets: GeForce Fortnight bundle – offer valid through may 22, 2019. For a limited time, purchase a ROG device with qualifying GTX graphics and get the GeForce Fortnight Counterattack set
Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB GDDR5 | powerful gaming performance
Tackle any task with the Intel Core i7 8750H (up to 3. 9GHz) processor
15. 6” high refresh rate 144Hz IPS Type Display | Slim 5mm Bezel and 3ms response time gaming laptop
16GB DDR4 2666MHz RAM | 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD + 1TB FireCuda SSHD | Windows 10 Home.Bluetooth 5.0

Gigabit wave 2 802. 11AC Wi Fi | Quad antennas. Rog range Boost Technology provides up to 30% wider coverage than dual antennas bit Wi Fi with quad antennas. Rog range Boost Technology provides up to 30% wider coverage than dual antennas
Hyper cool Pro thermal system | Dual 12V fans, Triple radiators and heatsink, anti dust technology
Customizable ASUS Aura RGB Gaming Keyboard, RGB ROG logo, and light bar for ambient lighting effect
